review: I made a withdrawal on a Pos machine and I was debited 4 times and I made a complaint to their email they told me they will get back to me and then only reverse half of the money it’s been one month am still writing to them for the complete money but they are not working on anything they are just replying with one particular text and it’s really annoying please send me my complete money for God sake I’ve been enjoying Banking with you guys not until this incident and it’s been 1 month you guys told me you reverse the complete money in 10 to 12 days and it’s already one month now… am really disappointed I wish I you have a branch in Benin I’ll just go straight and tell your customer service they’re not trying … this is so annoying I go come da beg una for my money again?
title: Kuda Bank is a good Bank though it’s fast but I’m so disappointed in their customer service.

review:
This bank is becoming worse by the day, it’s literally impossible to get hold of their customer care unit, you click on the send us a message on the app it takes you to a link you’ll read articles which doesn’t solve any problems: I want to talk to the customer care, a real human being that can understand the problems with my account and get it solved but they won’t let you do that and the in-app support team is always unavailable. How can I have a bank that I can’t talk to customer care? An online bank that doesn’t have a branch in the whole of edo state, now I sent money to someone and it’s been 24 hour he hasn’t received the payment and I haven’t got a refund as well, nobody to talk to, the other guy has called his bank and they told him no money came through, my so called bank won’t give me the option to even talk to them. Taking me yo read articles that might be of help.

The (report this an issue with this payment) option on the app is useless, it doesn’t click, you try to click it and it won’t click, you can’t chat with customer care, you can’t repost transactions, which kind bank be this?
title: Poor customer service

review: Well this my second year of using Kuda and I have made friends used it to but recently Kuda has been terrible ever since the upgrade. I made a transaction of 4950 on 12th November with a POS and the payment declined from the POS but I was debited and till date I still haven’t gotten a refund. I have been chatting the customer service but I didn’t get a response, Usually it doesn’t take Kuda to refund a decline payment within 30minutes but this time I don’t understand. All my friends that I referred to Kuda Omo last last they don move their money and they deleted the app because how can a bank app be acting as if the want to crash and run with people’s money. I’m the only one still using the app and not because you guys haven’t refunded my money but because I know Kuda can’t crash because it’s registered to CBN but my friends don’t understand that and they have to just leave you guys for now.
title: About the upgrade and a failed POS transaction

review: Kuda bank is becoming a more frustrating bank to bank with. They don’t pick up their customer care line one bit, they don’t reply on their social media platforms as well. On the 1st of December I used my card on a POS and the transaction was declined yet I was debited. I’ve requested for a reversal multiple times and even reached out to the help center on the app, they keep sending me fake mails that the matter is in progress but till date nothing has been done and up till today I haven’t gotten the money back. I keep trying to reach out yet no body takes care of my complaint. This is a very unreliable app and I don’t feel like my money is safe with them. I advice you all who is planning to bank with them to RUN AWAY because you will surely complain just like me and every other customer complain here. KUDA IS A SCAM !!!!
title: KUDA IS A SCAM!!!
developerResponse: {'id': 33871878, 'body': "Hi Christopher, We're sincerely sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused you and the delay in responding to your complaint. if you have send a mail to help@kuda.com or an in-app message ,please share with me your email address to enable us follow-up with the resolution of your complaint, ? Thank you 💜", 'modified': '2022-12-22T07:57:20Z'}

review: When I read the above review, I just thought to myself that someone that works at the bank definitely wrote this. After downloading and setting up the account for myself, I hadn’t even used it at all, and I was already impressed and excited. Everything worked very very very smoothly with the setup. My main reason for even actually downloading was the whole KYC palaver that I’ve had with my Opay account and my carbon account where they’re unable to verify you at all or when they can, it takes forever. This took just a few hours after submitting the requisite documents. And even collecting the documents is so seamlessly automated that it was a breeze. For now, it’s looking like bye bye to my main bank, unless something seriously goes awry. And I’m not hoping for that.
title: Great Banking App

review:
Please Kuda am seeing the reviews and l don’t like it, people are complaining of not reversing their money after going to pos, this is really and consumer service not working. Please fix all this, if fix all this your bank will become the highest bank ever in Africa’s yes that right.
User; according to reviews l must say you guys should not Go on pos instead do transfer, if not your money may lost. This app is good don’t uninstall it this app is good, it just part of what many company app facings, your will not be lost but don’t go pos, if you reason why do we have access to their atm even duo the bank doesn’t in your country, yes is very hard to create such a network without having the bank in your country, so guys let continue with transfer and support this company.
Thank you.

review: I’ve experienced this two times when I started using this kuda few days ago, a little transaction has been done which I’m happy about for the free services, but the problem is when I login my kuda into this kuda it will just keep loading and not take me to the main account where I can see my money, I’ll make the Face ID as required, but it to open us a problem, I’ve uninstalled and reinstalled this app I’ll set everything back up I’ll see my money, but few seconds I’ll try logging in again it will start the same thing so this gives me trust issues from this bank, please you try to fix this problems or is not by making everything be free for us.
title: Frustrating when you’re trying to logging, it will just keep booting like that.

review:
It’s been a struggle upgrading my account since I registered. It was a struggle getting someone to attend to me, a struggle getting them to verify my bvn, we are still dragging ID card issues. Why are they giving me more stress than a physical bank would? A deposit was made to the account before all this wahala and up till now it has not reflected. The support is a scam, you’d wait for days to get a simple ‘hello’. why would a bank only have one customer care number, it rings on end with one to pick. 
To think I made a post about them before registering urging people to use the bank! I am so disappointed.
title: Poor overall service

review: I made a withdrawal from a pos of 5700 naira but it was a fail transaction which I was debited for I waited to get my reversal back but I am yet to get it because the money was an amount paid by a customer, so I had to withdraw it and put the cash in the drawer, but I kept on waiting, i even called the customer service multiple times which was my airtime draining and sent an email which couldn’t go, I was later accused of stealing even after explaining the situation at hand Please Kuda reverse the money back to me I am getting to regret ever banking with Kuda because this is not the first time nor the second time nor even the third time and I am sure it wouldn’t be the last because it’s going to keep happening. Please do something about this poor management before you start losing customers.
title: Kuda is becoming a frustrating banking app

review:
So the kuda app has been wonderful but then there has been several issues with app recently and I’ll just try to highlight the little I can remember. 
1. The fixed savings: initially once I put let say 100k for fixed savings and I decide to withdraw 10k from it, I can withdraw the 10k. But now once I input the specific amount like 10k  that I want to withdraw from the 100k its withdraw the whole 100k  instead of the specific amount and I’ll need to re-add  the 90k all over again. 

2. I only see notifications on my notifications tray once i go into the app to read them they’re no where to be found on the app.  I applied to test the new app to be launched into beta for IOS I got a notification on how to go about it but now I can’t find it again.
title: Applaud and complain

review:
The truth is that I had always been a fan of Kuda and I enjoyed using the app not until a certain amount of money was removed from my account. They refunded the money back to me and one morning I received a mail from them saying some very pointless things, but the baseline was that they had taken the money back. I tried to find out why but I wasn’t given any solid reason as to why the money was removed. The annoying part is how my balance still shows that the money is in my account. Like, if you’re going to take my money without my permission and not refund it back to me, at least hide it so I don’t see it. 
Please don’t use Kuda because if you ever find yourself in this situation, your money is as good as gone. They’ll always have one meaningless explanation as to why they can’t give you back your money.

God bless Kuda Bank 🙌

review:
I am a business man and most of my transactions needs efficient monetary evidence of deposits. I was always running behind schedule until a very big partner of mine requested I pay him via KUDA. At first I pretended like I knew what he meant until it was time to make transfers, i now realized how much I have been wasting on bank charge n other unsolicited deductions. I went home with a testimony and every since then I am enjoying banking services at KUDA. The OVERDRAFT section of KUDA has also helped me reached more milestone and I hope it gets increased in no distance time. 
Thank You KUDA. You are indeed the breakthrough in the financial industry.
title: KUDA is better than the BEST

review: See innovation is not entirely changing things but simplifying complexity. Your new update just messed everything up. I don’t know if you guys tested this app on IOS. I’m going to uninstall until the bug is fixed. I could tell you one annoying thing I experienced with the app app, the menu bar at the bottom flicks like it’s trying to animate in but it does that repeatedly and does not allow you to stay on a page as it always returns back to the Home Screen. I like your service no doubt but please only improve what’s necessary
title: Update messed up

review:
After reading several comments on Twitter on how you treat your customers for having certain amount of money in their account, I'll give you a 1 star. 
You guys are fond of harrasing your customers with mopols after inviting them to your head office over receiving around 1 million naira and above. Is this how you treat your customers? Or having that money in your account is now a crime? Using the police to harass someone because they asked for their account to be unrestricted? How is this legal? They said kuda bank is the bank of the free, instead, it is the bank of the poor because it promotes poverty. You can't be rich and still use kuda because the will lock your money, asking where you got it from, nonsense. Please let me know how to close my account biko. I can't be using a bank that snitches on its customers.
title: Worst bank ever

review: From today i swear I will never use Kuda debit card for anything. Kuda debit card is a big failure for the bank. 2 weeks ago, I was debited 5,200 for a declined pos payment, test I was debited, 2 days ago I was debited 23,000 for a times out payment that was declined, again few mins ago, I was debited 45,500 for a declined payment due to system malfunction. I don’t understand why this bank always debits money for their failed POS payments. The most annoying part is that the customer care service ignores all your mails when you lay complains to them. This bank is too incompetent and unprofessional. I’m finally done with Kuda. Y’all ain’t ready. You think creating fancy bank app makes you a good bank? Work on your customer support first before making people bank with you people.
title: This is a failed bank

review:
This is the first time I’m actually writing a review on an app, Kuda is soooo worth it, no funny charges, free card, relatable customer care service.....everything is awesome, I have never been a fan of having the need to go to banking halls, or worse queuing at banking halls and Kuda has made life super easy by letting me set up an account all from my bed, it’s amazing!
Don’t get me started on the free-nature, no funny charges; not the one that someone would transfer 10k and I’d see 9950 in the account.
Don’t let me Shalaye any further, because I won’t be able to let myself stop lol.
Give Kuda a try and you’d come type a positive review, trust me
title: Star

review: For 3days now, you guys claim to have successfully delivered my N51,300 to the receiving end yet Paystack said they can't find the transaction. How did the receiving end get it if Paystack can't even trace it??? Three solid days. The transaction ref and ID you guys shared have been repeatedly checked yet you guys won't reverse my money. Now the receiver is embarrassing me and my family. Is it a small money or what? Take my money back from wherever it is hanging and reverse it hack. I have faced enough embarrassment because I used your bank.
title: So you can see this- Reverse my money!!!

review: I opened an account with them after the lunching of the app and the services were top notch then, now I can’t tell if my money is safe here anymore. After so many mails I tried calling again a lady picked and told me the transaction actually happened that I should go back to the POS centre to get my refund. A loose for me that money is gone I don’t stay anywhere around the POS center and I don’t know the POS guy. These incident has repeated itself consecutive times. Today it happened again … Please I need my money back no matter how small or big it is

review: Kuda has constituted in making my life miserable 😩 can’t even step out of my house to pick a pin, my phone rings every every minute of an hour without me responding to it because of the frustration and shame Kuda has brought upon me. Kuda is really not reliable and I would advise everyone using Kuda to be very careful with their banking services.

title: Customer care lagging

I’ve made a POS transactions from my account on 3 different occasions from 13th Feb and was debited. I lodged a complaint for months now and they’re yet to rectify it and reverse my money. They’ve made a call provided before unreachable because of malicious act they’re working on. 

This is to all intending Kuda customers please this bank is a fraud and need to be reported because I’ve see a lot of same case scenarios from different customers.

review: First you freeze your customer's account without proof of any illegal dealings, then you call on the Nigerian Police to brutalize the same customer because you have the power to do so, then you issue a statement stating that none of your staff was involved in the beating and that you infact handed him over to the Police. review:
Honestly, this app is wack. I wonder how it got this rating. I downloaded it for 2 weeks now and I cannot login cuz it’s saying I’m trying to initiate a device change. I have reached out to their help center which they claim to be working from 8am-8pm everyday but I wonder which work they are actually doing if they cannot help customers resolve problems. They asked me all the necessary questions, I answered and only for them to ghost me. I sent multiple mails but no response. Isn’t that enough to discredit a serious business setup, to me it is.

Finally I have made some saving in my kuda account but I am withdrawing all my money from kuda. With this level of bad costumer care I wonder where my help will come from if something happen to my money.
title: Honest review

review:
I’ve been enjoying kuda since when I started using it but lately I can’t say thesame I requested a card, they even held my money saying it’s for the delivery of the card It’s been over 6 months now and I still haven’t gotten my card. Whenever I contact them they keep saying they’ll get to me but never did,i kept calling and calling and I was getting thesame reply to wait. I really enjoyed the app but since I couldn’t get the card I can’t even use the app. It’s really unfair

title: Transaction

review:
Someone hacked my account and took an overdraft which i didn’t even know existed on the platform since i’ve been using the app, and borrowed about 25k! I wasn’t even with my phone at the time the transaction happened, was at church. Saw a notification in the evening about the transfer of #25,000 from my account to one GTB account. Tried reaching your customer care line, but it wasn’t going through. Tried reaching you via mail, didn’t get any response! How am I supposed to pay a debt I had no idea about? This is very bad!

I can’t pay that huge amount of money. Sorry. Can’t continue using your app also! my money is not safe with you at all!
title: Got scammed on your app!

title: A new Kuda
developerResponse: {'id': 37208239, 'body': "Hi there , Here's how to change the phone number on your Kuda Account1. Go to selfhelp.kuda.com 2. Select Update my phone number 3. Sign in using your Email and Password 4. Enter the New Phone Number you like to add. 5. Enter the code sent to your new number. 6. Enter your 4-digit transaction pin 7. Select Continue to Verify your identity with a selfie video 8. Select Start, to Take a selfie video and make 2-3 circles with your face. 9. Select the Red button at the center to Stop 10. Select Done once completed. We'll send you a mail once your New Phone Number has been updated, Thank you💜", 'modified': '2023-06-19T13:53:55Z'}

ii. When I want to transfer money to a new account, after typing in the account number, I can’t confirm if its the correct account name until I attempt submission.

iii. Why can’t I download/share receipts directly after a successful transaction? I need to go back to my transaction list, select the transaction, then share the receipt there.

review:
I have used other financial apps, and I won’t mention names so that this doesn’t sound like I was paid to write.
Those other apps? Both those for loans and banking, they don’t come close.

I use Kuda for payments and it’s a breeze. I just had an experience with their overdrafts, and I can boast that it is the best in Nigeria. Why am I boasting for something that’s not mine? I dunno.

Just a happy customer saying thank you to Kuda.

PS: A warning note though, don’t take Kuda’s overdraft if you don’t have the means to pay back.
title: The best by a mile

review: Terrible customer service!!! Locking up accounts when you feel like…. It’s not certainly something I would advice anyone to solely rely on personally but overall it’s a good app/person finance platform.
title: Takes so long for funds to reflect in the account

review:
This is the best banking app in Nigeria. Here’s why
1)Easy to setup within minutes, as long as you have all the required documents.
2)Transactions are seamless
3)No hidden charges
4)You can refresh the app and your new balance will automatically be updated just like my Barclay’s bank app.
5)Ease of use
6)25 free transfers each month
7)Transfers are instant

I could go on but the only negative i can point out really is the delivery of their debit card. It took almost 4 months but asides that, quality service all round. Well done guys!
title: Fantastic app

review:
I clicked on receiving my free atm card, and I was immediately asked to credit my account first with nothing less than 1k, which I did, then I filled my details for the card and my pin and after all was said and done, click confirm to send me my card, and next thing is..
"Sorry, we have paused making and distributing atm cards" for whatsoever the ducking reason..
Are you guys ok?
When you knew that cards  are currently unavailable, why didn't you say that first? Why tell me to fill my details and credit my account when you knew I can't get my card yet.
Must everything Nigerian always have traces of scam and frauduence in it?
Are you playing me for a fool or what?
Rubbish!

title: Testimony and recommendation
developerResponse:
{'id': 37069826, 'body': 'Hi there ,
Please our physical debit card request is opened to tier 3 customers and the ost of the debit card is #1000
We offer two options on how to get your card:
A personal pick up from the Kuda office at 11 Commercial Avenue, Sabo, Yaba, Lagos for free.
Note: To pick up your card, you are required to present a valid government-issued ID. To have a third party receive your card on your behalf, the third party needs to present a signed letter of authorization from you and a valid government-issued ID.
Please, note we will not take responsibility if the third party who receives your card on your behalf loses or damages the card.
A door step delivery at an extra charge based on your location.Thank you 💜



', 'modified': '2023-06-12T12:26:16Z'}

review:
Kuda, why are you collecting stamp duties like other banks when other microfinance banks aren’t?

Would have given a 5 star but for the charge.
title: 50 naira charge
developerResponse: {'id': 37286667, 'body': 'In line with the FGN Stamp Duty Act, we’re required by law to apply a 50 naira charge to all deposits of 10,000 naira or more made into your Kuda account\r\nwe don’t gain anything from the charge.All financial institutions have been directed by the Federal Government to apply the charge,and we remit the entire charge to the government\r\n', 'modified': '2023-06-23T08:50:11Z'}

title: I love it. But they deduct 50naira on each of my transactions
developerResponse:
{'id': 36505292, 'body': 'Hi there ,
In line with the FGN Stamp Duty Act, we’re required by law to apply a 50 naira charge to all deposits of 10,000 naira or more made into your Kuda account
we don’t gain anything from the charge.All financial institutions have been directed by the Federal Government to apply the charge,and we remit the entire charge to the government
Thank you ', 'modified': '2023-05-14T08:10:24Z'}

I'm very sorry for the delayed response .

Your transaction PIN secures your transactions. 
Please refresh the app. by signing out and signing in , with the email address and password then reset the pin 

To change or create new transaction PIN 

Log into your Kuda app or you reset the PIN on the webapp. https://app.kuda.com/login

Tap More at the bottom of your Kuda dashboard.

Tap Security then tap Transaction PIN  

Tap Reset Now use the Reset code and you'll be prompted to enter a new pin. 

I'm sorry for the inconvenience this may have caused you.

Thank you 💜
", 'modified': '2023-03-16T12:12:07Z'}

review: Kuda is a very stupid bank honestly if you’re planning to use this bank don’t do it cuz you will only regret it, cuz most people will be like kuda is the best bank that’s because they haven’t shown you pepper, that was how i was going about saying that rubbish until it actually happened to me, i made transfer of 40k and the transfer showed successful in my kuda app but the other person did not receive the money, i tried calling kuda bank to reverse the money back to my account the number was not connecting, i even dm them on instagram, Facebook, Twitter even on mail, I didn’t get a reply from them, remember kuda is a bank that their office is only in lagos, we that are not staying in Lagos the only way we can reach them is through online and in my case they are not replying, so I would advice u it’s better to use normal commercial banks, cuz they have branches everywhere and at least you can go to their branch to vent everyday until they reverse the money, but in kuda bank who you wan vent give, kuda bank was my savings bank but i have moved all my money from that bank, cuz I wouldn’t want to fall victim of that again, let he that have ears here, don’t wait till it happens to you before you learn with regret in your heart. And plus i did my research and discovered that so many persons are victim of this, even people that up to 2 million was debited and the money was not returned, right now me and some group of people are looking for ways to drag them down on social media for their fraudulent activities.

review: I’m confused on how a bank that claims bank of the free doesn’t prove that in their customer care response. I was deducted a certain amount of money , you can’t reach the customer care through the app cos it’s a bot that will respond so what’s the use of the that, if you send mails to kuda you won’t receive a response yet on the app it tells you that you will be responded to immediately, I have sent them multiple mails till now I don’t have any response. I them decided to call the customer care and note that this is not toll free, wasted my credit trying to explain to a male customer care what the problem was but he seemed to know it all and didn’t want to hear my complaint, not sure he even understands basic mathematics cos I kept explaining the same thing over and over and the next thing he told me to do fast that there are other customers on the line just imagine I got angry and told him if that was any of my business , what a rude customer care I’m tellin you my problems wasting my credit cos I can’t reach you on other platforms and you are telling me that. Till today I have not gotten a response to my mails...my problem has not been solved and I keep on sending mails no response to any. I later called again and spoke to a lady customer care better than the other person I spoke to and she assured me My matter will be resolved and told me to send a couple of mails and documents for verification and stuffs but till today I have not gotten a response. I called again she told me the same thing that my matter will be attended to by the same guy that was speaking rudely to me. Till now I have not received any response so why bother me by telling me to send documents and pictures of myself and utility bills just for me not to get a response. Poor customer care = poor app based in customer care response = poor banking system.

review: There is nothing like reset pin on Kuda app why that is not proper
title: Reset pin
developerResponse:
{'id': 35452600, 'body': "Hi there,


Thank you for reaching out to us and I'm sorry for the delayed response.


Please follow the steps below to create or change your transaction PIN.

1. Log into your Kuda app

2. Tap More at the bottom of your Kuda dashboard.

3. Tap Security then tap Transaction PIN
  
4. Tap Reset Now, use the OTP code sent to your registered phone number, and you'll be prompted to enter a new pin.

If you encounter any challenges, please share a screenshot of the error message.  


Thank you.💜", 'modified': '2023-03-18T08:00:47Z'}

title: Not good enough

review:
The only thing that was comforting about your lack of a physical presence near me was how easy your app was to use. I had zero issues but not anymore.

Your new update is not enjoyable to use. I can’t see bank details of beneficiaries, so for me who has many bank accounts and of course, all with the same name, I have to open each beneficiary name to see the name of the bank. 

Now say I decide to rename each of my accounts saved as a beneficiary to reflect the name of the bank so it’ll be easier to make transfers, there’s a new problem. Once you decide to edit the name of a beneficiary, you MUST input a phone number.

So to rename my bank accounts saved as beneficiaries to reflect the bank name and make it easier to make transfers, I need to makeup phone numbers for all 6 accounts.

Let say that’s not enough of an inconvenience. Next, I would previously be able to tell, from the transactions listed on the home page, which ones were debits or credits by a colour code, now that no longer exists. I’d need to open every transaction to know whether virtue has left me or if I’ve received reward for my labour.

I almost forgot being constantly logged out of the app and needing to sign in all over again.

INCONVENIENT. All of it.

My user experience is full of tribulations and unfortunately for me I use your bank app for 80% of my transactions.

Your previous app version was perfect, I had no complaints. No one likes to stay where there are tribulations, please repair these issues.
title: Your app update is terrible

review: @kuda why can’t I access my money after upgrading the app. I need my money ASAP

review: For three days now, I have just purchased a new iPhone and for three days now I have been trying to login to the app. I know I’m doing everything thing right because with same process I can easily sign into an Android device. On the IOS, it keeps coming back with error at the video verification stage and asking to try again. While I commend Kuda for a good security job, it is not nice to install a key that will require a locksmith for you to open. If I cannot sign into the IOS device, I might consider this is where our journey comes to an end because I have Carbon, Opay, Cowrywise, Piggyvest, Binance, Chipper all signed in with no hassle, and I’m considering streaming it down to one or two. Insect wey dey think say him na bird because e dey fly. Nonsense. Even real banks never give me this kind of assignment to solve

They’ll always give me notifications each time they’re updating the app but they won’t give me any reply about my ID verification..It was supposed to be my #1 bank, I will give 5 stars only if you guys confirm my ID or give me another option to re upload it. But until then, Its sucks.! Because I can’t make business transactions with my kuda bank, Currently I only use kuda for payments like buying of fuels, gas and recharge cards because I haven’t been able to upgrade my transaction limits..! review: Kuda bank has to be a low key scam or something. I’ve been using it for a while, it’s been all good. So convenient for me that I started using as my main account. But then it’s been almost two weeks since I got debited at a POS for over 17000 Naira and the payment was declined and the money wasn’t reversed. No problem right? all I have to do is submit my receipt and everything would be fine? NO. They refused to refund me after several queries, at a time they tried to trick me by telling me the money will be sent to my account but I won’t see an alert because it’s done manually I checked but I didn’t see any increase. Till now I’m still creating new tickets to chat with them because the old chat keep disappearing as if the matter has been resolved. I’m starting to believe they are up to no good.
